task: Find the exact location name used in the first scene heading of the official script for Series 9, Episode 11 of Doctor Who, where the Doctor is trapped inside an ever-shifting maze.
plan_summary: Use the web_surfer to search for the official script of Series 9, Episode 11 of Doctor Who and identify the setting mentioned in the first scene heading.

steps.title: Search for the official script of Doctor Who Series 9, Episode 11
steps.details: Conduct a web search to find the official script or a reliable transcript of Series 9, Episode 11 of Doctor Who.

steps.title: Identify the setting from the first scene heading in the script
steps.details: Once the script is found, examine the first scene heading to extract the specific location name where the Doctor is trapped.
